bibl.title: A New Chronology for the Ptolemaic Coins of Judah.
bibl.note: Present a new classification and chronology for the Ptolemaic coins of Judah. - History of Scholarship. - Numismatic Evidence. - New Classification and Chronology. - Axis Preferences. - X-Ray Fluorescence Analysis of Yehud Late Persian-Period Issues and Ptolemaic Coins of Judah. - Pp. 25-28: Appendix 1. Hoards of Persian Yehud Coins and Ptolemaic Issues of Judah; - 28-29: Appendix 2. Recorded Weights of 232 Ptolemaic Quarter Obols of Judah; - 29-38: Corpus of the Ptolemaic Coinage of Judah. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Haim Gitler & Catharine Lorber, A New Chronology for the Ptolemaic Coins of Judah.
AJN 2nd S., 18 (2006) pp. 1-41, 5 tabl., 2 figg. et pll. 1-2.

Present a new classification and chronology for the Ptolemaic coins of Judah. - History of Scholarship. - Numismatic Evidence. - New Classification and Chronology. - Axis Preferences. - X-Ray Fluorescence Analysis of Yehud Late Persian-Period Issues and Ptolemaic Coins of Judah. - Pp. 25-28: Appendix 1. Hoards of Persian Yehud Coins and Ptolemaic Issues of Judah; - 28-29: Appendix 2. Recorded Weights of 232 Ptolemaic Quarter Obols of Judah; - 29-38: Corpus of the Ptolemaic Coinage of Judah. - Avec résumé en anglais.
